Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Role.description: The Role schema contains a Redfish role to use in conjunction with a manager account.
Role.longDescription: This resource represents the Redfish role for the user account.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AlternateRoleId.description: An equivalent role to use when this role is restricted.
AlternateRoleId.longDescription: This property shall contain a non-restricted `RoleId` intended to be used in its place when the Restricted property contains the value `true`.

AssignedPrivileges.description: The Redfish privileges for this role.
AssignedPrivileges.longDescription: This property shall contain the Redfish privileges for this role.  For predefined roles, this property shall be read-only.  For custom roles, some implementations might prevent writing to this property.

IsPredefined.description: An indication of whether the role is predefined by Redfish or an OEM rather than a client-defined role.
IsPredefined.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the role is predefined by Redfish or an OEM as contrasted with a client-defined role.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemPrivileges.description: The OEM privileges for this role.
OemPrivileges.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM privileges for this role.  For predefined roles, this property shall be read-only.  For custom roles, some implementations might prevent writing to this property.

Restricted.description: An indication of whether use of the role is restricted.
Restricted.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether use of the role is restricted by a service as defined by the 'Restricted roles and restricted privileges' clause of the Redfish Specification.  If this property is not present, the value shall be assumed to be `false`.

RoleId.longDescription: This property shall contain the string name of the role.  This property shall contain the same value as the Id property.

title: #Role.v1_3_0.Role
